alignments.name: Lawful Good
alignments.description: Can be counted on to do the right thing as expected by society.

alignments.name: Neutral Good
alignments.description: Do the best they can to help others according to their needs.

alignments.name: Chaotic Good
alignments.description: Act as their conscience directs, with little regard for what others expect.

alignments.name: Lawful Neutral
alignments.description: Act in accordance with law, tradition, or personal codes.

alignments.name: Neutral
alignments.description: The alignment of those who prefer to steer clear of moral questions and donâ€™t take sides, doing what seems best at the time.

alignments.name: Chaotic Neutral
alignments.description: Creatures follow their whims, holding their personal freedom above all else. Many barbarians and rogues, and some bards, are chaotic neutral.

alignments.name: Lawful Evil
alignments.description: Methodically take what they want, within the limits of a code of tradition, loyalty, or order. Devils, blue dragons, and hobgoblins are lawful evil.

alignments.name: Neutral Evil
alignments.description: The alignment of those who do whatever they can get away with, without compassion or qualms.

alignments.name: Chaotic Evil
alignments.description: Act with arbitrary violence, spurred by their greed, hatred, or bloodlust.
